name: Kamam
greetingText: You are a soul my heart is glad to have met.
wishText: As You age, may you wild heart live for younger days;)
textInChatBox: Wishing you a day as beautiful as your!
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now Come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
